name: Deflektor (itch) (Felipe Gomes, danielsouzalima, IcyShapes, Diego Crispim)
name_original: Deflektor (itch) (Felipe Gomes, danielsouzalima, IcyShapes, Diego Crispim)
description:
Controls

WASD to move;   Mouse to aim;   Left-click to attack;   Space to pause.

Deflektor is a game about using your reflexes to survive a chaotic battleground under constant enemy fire and ricocheting projectiles.

You take the mantle of the Deflektor, a computer virus built to undermine the world threatening super computer C4X01. Use your superhuman reflexes to avoid being hit and destroy the enemy's capacitors. 

Beware! The enemy turrets are immune to your attacks, so hit him only where it hurts and use your skills to become the Deflektor!
